Cougaar 12.7

Package org.cougaar.core.qos.metrics

This package contains the Cougaar "Quality of Service" (QoS) support for runtime metrics.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Constants Assorted constants for key and path construction, and credibility.
DataFeedRegistrationService The primary function of this Service is to add new "data feeds" to the MetricsUpdateService.
DataProvider No longer used?
Metric Metrics are the information abstraction for the values manipulated by the MetricsService.
MetricNotificationQualifier This API is used to specify a qualification on potential callbacks from the MetricsService subscriptions.
MetricsService This is the query interface to the metrics services.
MetricsUpdateService This service allows clients to insert raw data directly into the metrics services, using an implicit data feed.
VariableEvaluator VariableEvaluators are used to provide context-specific values for variables that appear in metrics queuries.
 

Class Summary
AgentLoadLoggerPlugin This Plugin periodically dumps Agent load data (1sec load average) for each local Agent to the file <node>-agent-data.log, where <node> is the name of the Node.
AgentLoadServlet This Servlet collects cpu and message metrics for each local Agent and displays the result in a nicely formatted web page.
AgentLoadTracePlugin The test Plugin will dump the time history of an Agent's resource load into the logging system.
AgentStatusRatePlugin This Plugin converts the AgentStatusService records into Metrics.
CredibilityQualifier Instances of this class can be used to restrict callbacks from MetricsService subscriptions unless the new value meets a given credoibility threshold.
DecayingHistory This helper class is used to keep a history of sensor values and process them into metrics representing rates.
DecayingHistory.SnapShot These are snapshots as stored in history.
DeltaValueQualifier Instances of this class can be used to restrict callbacks from MetricsService subscriptions unless the new value differs from the previous value by a given delta.
FeedLoader This Component uses its parameters to create and register a DataFeed.
MetricImpl This is the standard implementation of Metric.
MetricQueryServlet This Servlet allows url-based access into the metrics service.
MetricsBlasterPlugin This test Plugin publishes data into the MetricsUpdateService at high rates and subscribes to formulas using that data.
MetricsClientPlugin Basic Metric Service Client subscribes to a Metric and prints the value to standout, when the Metric value ever changes.
MetricsRSSFeedServlet  
MetricsServiceProvider This Component provides trivial implementation of the MetricsService, MetricsUpdateService and DataFeedRegistrationService.
MetricsServlet Abstract parent class of many Metrics-related servlets.
MetricsServletPlugin This Plugin loads a standard set of metric servlets.
MetricsWriterServlet This Servlet provides url access to the MetricsUpdateService.
NodeResourcesServlet This Servlet displays the Host resource metrics, using the Node to get at it.
NullMetricsServiceImpl Null MetricsSevice implementation that always returnds 0 `* credibility Metrics.
NullMetricsUpdateServiceImpl Null MetricsUpdateService that sends updates into oblivion.
ParameterizedPlugin Deprecated.
PersistenceAdapterPlugin Gathers persistence metrics from the PersistenceMetricsService and publishes them as Metrics into the MetricsUpdateService.
QosComponent Abstract parent class of Components in the qos Container.
RemoteAgentServlet This Servlet displays a summary of all interactions between any Agent on this Node and the Agents they talk to (remote or loca).
ServletUtilities Utility class with static fields and methods that are useful for html display of metrics data.
StandardVariableEvaluator This VariableEvaluator can find values for $(localhost) (the current host), $(localnode) (the current node) and $(localagent) (the current agent).
 

Package org.cougaar.core.qos.metrics Description

This package contains the Cougaar "Quality of Service" (QoS) support for runtime metrics.

MetricsService documentation is in:
$COUGAAR_INSTALL_PATH/doc/OnlineManual/MetricsService/index.html

For more detail, see the Cougaar Documentation.
